Plot: A pack of naïve teenagers conspire to murder a mutual friend, whose aggressive demeanor has proved too much.
Title: Bully
Writer: Jim Schutze (book), David McKenna (screenplay), Roger Pullis (screenplay)
Actors: Brad Renfro, Bijou Phillips, Rachel Miner, Nick Stahl
tomatoConsensus: With its lingering shots of naked teenage bodies, Bully feels more sordidly exploitative than realistic.
